# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: Write a program for registering Rambler.ru mails with passing captcha in Python

Відповідь: import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from selenium import webdriver
 
url = "https://id.rambler.ru/register"
 
driver = webdriver.Firefox()
driver.get(url)
 
username_input = driver.find_element_by_id("z_username")
username_input.send_keys("<Your username>")
 
password_input = driver.find_element_by_id("z_password")
password_input.send_keys("<Your password>")
 
password_reenter_input = driver.find_element_by_id("z_password_reenter")
password_reenter_input.send_keys("<Your password>")
 
# captcha is being solved
page = requests.get(url)
soup = BeautifulSoup(page.content, 'html.parser')
captcha_img = soup.find('img', class_='form-item__captcha-image')
captcha_src = captcha_img['src']
 
txt_captcha_input = driver.find_element_by_name('field_captcha_value')
txt_captcha_input.send_keys(get_captcha_val(captcha_src))
 
submit_btn = driver.find_element_by_id("register_submit")
submit_btn.submit()
